titles.title: A bill to provide for the withdrawal and protection of certain Federal land in the State of New Mexico.
Chaco Cultural Heritage Area Protection Act of 2018
Chaco Cultural Heritage Area Protection Act of 2018
Chaco Cultural Heritage Area Protection Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Chaco Cultural Heritage Area Protection Act of 2018
This bill withdraws the federal lands and interests that are within the Chaco Cultural Heritage Withdrawal Area in New Mexico and any land or interest within such area which is acquired by the federal government after enactment of this bill from:
entry, appropriation, and disposal under the public land laws; location, entry, and patent under mining laws; and operation of the mineral leasing, mineral materials, and geothermal leasing laws.
